narration_text: Sinbad, deciding the backpack holds less immediate value than a comprehensive sweep of the crash site, leaves it behind. The jungle floor is a chaotic jumble of shattered metal, torn fabric, and unearthed earth. The air hangs heavy with the smell of jet fuel and crushed vegetation. Every rustle of leaves, every snap of a twig, sends a jolt of adrenaline through you. The helicopter's mangled remains provide scant comfort, and the silence is almost deafening, broken only by the distant calls of unseen creatures. You push onward, scanning the debris field for anything useful, anything that might aid your survival.

dialogue.speaker: Sinbad
dialogue.text: Gotta focus. There has to be something useful here.

options: Examine the Twisted Communications Panel more closely.
Search for survivors among the wreckage.
Proceed further into the jungle along the jungle path.

active_objectives.description: Survive on the island and find a way to contact the outside world.

history_entry: Sinbad leaves the backpack behind to continue searching the crash site for useful supplies and potential survivors.

interactive_elements.name: Twisted Communications Panel
interactive_elements.description: The helicopter's communications panel, mangled but potentially salvageable.

interactive_elements.name: Medical Kit
interactive_elements.description: A small medical kit with basic supplies.

world_info.name: Jurassic Park Survival
world_info.description: A remote island sanctuary home to genetically engineered dinosaurs.
